Hey GWpirateGW, just like to start by saying thanks for your trouble in uploading this game but I am having a small problem that probably has a small and easy fix but I can't figure it out. I copy and pasted both the msvcr100.dll and the binkw32.dll but when I try and run the game it gives me this error message "The procedure entry point_BinkSetMixBins@16 could not be located in the dynamic link library binkw32.dll." How would I go about fixing this problem? Any help would be greatly appreciated. =D

@DasGhost

contact me at MrGWGProductions if you still need help(on you||tube

download your missing dll here

http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?binkw32

also to be safe I always scan small files like that here

http://www.virustotal.com/

Hope that helps
#1

Download the binkw32.dll file by browsing the download site (see Resources), then clicking on "Save File" to start the download.
#2

Locate the newly downloaded file and right-click it. Click on the "Extract" option in the sub-menu and select the computer desktop as the extraction location.
#3

Right-click the "Start" button in the lower left-hand corner of the desktop. The sub-menu will open. Select "Explore." The "Windows Explorer" screen will appear.
#4

Browse the left panel in Windows Explorer and locate the "System" folder. The location of the "System" folder depends on your Windows version. Windows 7, Windows XP and Windows Vista have the "System" folder in "C:\Windows\System32." Windows 2000 and Windows NT have the "System" folder in "C:\WINNT\System32."
#5

Click on the "Desktop" folder in the left panel. The desktop contents will appear in the right panel of Explorer. Find and right-click the "binkw32.dll" file in the right panel and select "Copy."
#6

Go to the left panel in "Windows Explorer" and click your "System" folder. The folder will open and the items in the folder are displayed in the right panel of Explorer. Right-click on the right panel of Explorer and select "Paste." The "binkw32.dll" file will be pasted into your "System" folder and fix the error.


Read more: How to Fix The "Dynamic Link Library Binkw32.dll Could Not Be Found" Error | eHow.com http://www.ehow.com/how_6832714_fix-could-not-found_-error.html#ixzz113FtOTfZ

I have helped walk 3 people through and remote installed it for 5 others via Team Viewer. I also have a video install tutorial. For people with the binkw32.dll  error. here is how I fixed the issue for a person a day ago.

1. uninstall the game.
2. download C Cleaner & clean the registry.
3. download binkw32.dll  from a dll site(google it or message me for a link) and paste that to your c:system or c:system 32 folder(id have to relook, slightly hung over atm) then reinstall the game and copy the crack. That should fix the issue

for laggers, set all settings to low. 

for game saves, sadly same as the binkw32.dll  error people, uninstall, clean registry and reinstall
